headline.main: Australia Quicks Need to Bowl Straighter, Says Hazlewood
headline.print_headline: Australia Quicks Need to Bowl Straighter, Says Hazlewood

lead_paragraph: Aiming at the stumps should be the way forward for Australia's quicks against India to take advantage of the uneven bounce on the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium pitch, fast bowler Josh Hazlewood said on Monday.
snippet: Aiming at the stumps should be the way forward for Australia's quicks against India to take advantage of the uneven bounce on the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium pitch, fast bowler Josh Hazlewood said on Monday....
